problems.title: Print Array in Reverse (Recursive)
problems.description:
Given an array of N integers, print the elements in reverse order using recursion. Each element should be printed on a new line.

Input Format:
First line: integer N.
Second line: N integers separated by space.

Output Format:
Print the elements from index N-1 down to 0, each on a new line.
hintsList: Recursive idea: printReverse(arr, n-1) after printing arr[n-1] OR first recurse down then print when unwinding.
